title: children
description: Children of a dataset or directory

dataset_id.description: The parent dataset ID, if type is file or directory. Otherwise dataset ID.

dataset_version.description: The parent dataset VERSION, if type is file or directory. Otherwise dataset VERSION.

path.description: Path of the child relative to parent dataset

url.description: If type is file: url at which the file is available for download

contentbytesize.description: If type is file: size of file in bytes
